channels.name: diary
channels.description: To save all your personal thoughts, pictures and others.

eventExamples.value: My nice poem goes here

folders.name: social
folders.description: For all social content. Events are usually saved in the subfolder corresponding to the concerned social network.

value.message: happy to be in warm India today when I see my friends' pics in Switzerland :)

folders.name: followers
folders.description: To keep track of the user's number of followers at a given time.

value.content: Blah blah .. love Pryv .. so cool for you!

folders.name: conversation
folders.description: In this folder, the user can keep track of her discussions on the phone, on skype, etc.

channels.name: activity
channels.description: Where a user can save her various work and leisure activities.

folders.name: work
folders.description: This folder contains all events related to the user's work. The user should be able to save her work activities in different subfolders depending on the type of work she is achieving.

folders.name: projectABC
folders.description: This is an example of folder the user could create in this channel for a specific project she has been working on.

folders.name: parties
folders.description: Ideal to keep pictures of your crazy parties.

channels.name: health
channels.description: This channel is dedicated to the user and her close family's health. The goal here is to save all the data related to one's health: weight, medication, doctor visits, etc.

folders.name: feeling
folders.description: This is an example of folder you could create in this channel. Why not store here how the user feels every day?

folders.name: medication
folders.description: Example of folder where you could keep track of what medication has been taken when.

channels.name: position
channels.description: This channel is especially suited for all events automatically saved by the user's devices. Imagine an iphone app recording the user's position every 10 minutes. Here is the perfect place to save this data.

folders.name: iphone
folders.description: This is an example of folder where you could record geolocation information coming from the user's iphone.

folders.name: computer
folders.description: This is an example of folder where you could record geolocation information coming from the user's computer.

channels.name: finance
channels.description: A channel to save all financial aspects of the user's life.

folders.name: bank ABC
folders.description: This is an example of folder you could create in this channel. A subfolder could be created for each bank account of the user for instance.

channels.name: householding
channels.description: A place to save all the user's data related to householding: shopping lists, bills, the plumber's visits, etc.

folders.name: shopping
folders.description: This is an example of folder you could create in this channel to save all household shopping-related data.

folders.name: facilities
folders.description: This is an example of folder you could create in this channel.

channels.name: kids
channels.description: A channel for the user to save all her children pictures.

folders.name: John
folders.description: This is an example of folder you could create in this channel. The idea here is to create one folder for each child of the user.
